mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (btitle, bcontent, bwriter) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter});
mapper.select: select a.bid, a.btitle, a.bwriter, a.bdate, a.bhit, a.mname as bwritername from (select @rownum := @rownum + 1 rownum, bid, btitle, bwriter, date_format(bdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as bdate, bhit, mname FROM (SELECT bid, btitle, bwriter, date_format(bdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as bdate, bhit, mname FROM freeboard f INNER JOIN member m on (f.bwriter = m.username)) as b where(@rownum := 0) = 0 order by bid desc) as a where rownum between (#{pageNum}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 and (#{pageNum}*#{pageSize});
SELECT bid, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, date_format(bdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as bdate, bhit, m.mname as bwritername FROM freeboard f LEFT JOIN member m ON (f.bwriter = m.username) WHERE bid=#{bid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboardReply (bid, rcontent, rwriter) VALUES (#{bid}, #{rcontent}, #{rwriter});
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET bhit = bhit + 1 WHERE bid = #{bid};
mapper.select: select count(bid) as cnt from freeBoard;
